name: Microsoft Windows 10
description: List of shortcuts only for Windows 10

Windows Snapping.val: Snap current window to the left side of the screen
Snap current window the the right side of the screen
Snap current window to the top of the screen
Snap current window to the bottom of the screen

Task view / Window Management.val: Opens the new Task View interface

Virtual Desktops.val: Create a new virtual desktop and switch to it
Switch to the virtual desktop on the left
Switch to the virtual desktop on the right

Command Prompt.val: Selects text to the left of the cursor
Selects text to the right of the cursor
Moves the cursor, Selects the words along the left
Moves the cursor, Selects the words along the right
Moves the cursor to the beginning of the current line, selects text along the way
Moves the cursor to the end of the current line, selects text along the way
Moves the cursor up the screen, selects text
Moves the cursor down the screen, selects text
Moves the cursor to the beginning,selects all text between the cursor and the beginning
Moves the cursor to the end,selects all text between the cursor and the end

More Shortcuts.val: Moves one line up in the Command Prompt’s history
Moves one line down in the Command Prompt’s history
Moves one page up in the Command Prompt’s history
Moves one page down in the Command Prompt’s history
Enter “mark mode,” which helps for selecting text
